createNewAccountJni() - Method in class org.matrix.olm.OlmAccount
Create a new account and return it to JAVA side.
Since a C prt is returned as a jlong, special care will be taken to make the cast (OlmAccount* to jlong) platform independent.
createNewSessionJni(byte[], boolean) - Method in class org.matrix.olm.OlmInboundGroupSession
Initialize a new inbound group session and return it to JAVA side.
Since a C prt is returned as a jlong, special care will be taken to make the cast (OlmInboundGroupSession* to jlong) platform independent.
createNewSessionJni() - Method in class org.matrix.olm.OlmOutboundGroupSession
Create the corresponding OLM outbound group session in native side.
An exception is thrown if the operation fails.
createNewSessionJni() - Method in class org.matrix.olm.OlmSession
Create an OLM session in native side.
Do not forget to call OlmSession.releaseSession() when JAVA side is done.

G

generateOneTimeKeys(int) - Method in class org.matrix.olm.OlmAccount
Generate a number of new one time keys.
If total number of keys stored by this account exceeds OlmAccount.maxOneTimeKeys(), the old keys are discarded.
The corresponding keys are retrieved by OlmAccount.oneTimeKeys().
generateOneTimeKeysJni(int) - Method in class org.matrix.olm.OlmAccount
Generate a number of new one time keys.
If total number of keys stored by this account exceeds OlmAccount.maxOneTimeKeys(), the old keys are discarded.

identityKeysJni() - Method in class org.matrix.olm.OlmAccount

J

JSON_KEY_FINGER_PRINT_KEY - Static variable in class org.matrix.olm.OlmAccount
Ed25519 finger print is a public-key cryptographic system for signing messages.
In Matrix, each device has an Ed25519 key pair which serves to identify that device.
JSON_KEY_IDENTITY_KEY - Static variable in class org.matrix.olm.OlmAccount
Curve25519 identity key is a public-key cryptographic system which can be used to establish a shared secret.
In Matrix, each device has a long-lived Curve25519 identity key which is used to establish Olm sessions with that device.
JSON_KEY_ONE_TIME_KEY - Static variable in class org.matrix.olm.OlmAccount
As well as the identity key, each device creates a number of Curve25519 key pairs which are also used to establish Olm sessions, but can only be used once.

O

OlmAccount - Class in org.matrix.olm
Account class used to create Olm sessions in conjunction with OlmSession class.
OlmAccount provides APIs to retrieve the Olm keys.
OlmAccount() - Constructor for class org.matrix.olm.OlmAccount
 
OlmException - Exception in org.matrix.olm
Exception class to identify specific Olm SDK exceptions.
OlmException(int, String) - Constructor for exception org.matrix.olm.OlmException
 
OlmInboundGroupSession - Class in org.matrix.olm
Class used to create an inbound Megolm session.
Counter part of the outbound group session OlmOutboundGroupSession, this class decrypts the messages sent by the outbound side.
OlmInboundGroupSession(String) - Constructor for class org.matrix.olm.OlmInboundGroupSession
Constructor.
Create and save a new native session instance ID and start a new inbound group session.
OlmInboundGroupSession(String, boolean) - Constructor for class org.matrix.olm.OlmInboundGroupSession
Constructor.
Create and save a new native session instance ID and start a new inbound group session.
OlmInboundGroupSession.DecryptMessageResult - Class in org.matrix.olm
Result in OlmInboundGroupSession.decryptMessage(String)
OlmManager - Class in org.matrix.olm
Olm SDK entry point class.
An OlmManager instance must be created at first to enable native library load.
OlmManager() - Constructor for class org.matrix.olm.OlmManager
Constructor.
OlmMessage - Class in org.matrix.olm
Message class used in Olm sessions to contain the encrypted data.
See OlmSession.decryptMessage(OlmMessage) and OlmSession.encryptMessage(String).
OlmMessage() - Constructor for class org.matrix.olm.OlmMessage
 
OlmOutboundGroupSession - Class in org.matrix.olm
Class used to create an outbound a Megolm session.
To send a first message in an encrypted room, the client should start a new outbound Megolm session.
OlmOutboundGroupSession() - Constructor for class org.matrix.olm.OlmOutboundGroupSession
Constructor.
Create and save a new session native instance ID and initialise a new outbound group session.
OlmSession - Class in org.matrix.olm
Session class used to create Olm sessions in conjunction with OlmAccount class.
Olm session is used to encrypt data between devices, especially to create Olm group sessions (see OlmOutboundGroupSession and OlmInboundGroupSession).
To establish an Olm session with Bob, Alice calls OlmSession.initOutboundSession(OlmAccount, String, String) with Bob's identity and onetime keys.
OlmSession() - Constructor for class org.matrix.olm.OlmSession
 
OlmUtility - Class in org.matrix.olm
Olm SDK helper class.
OlmUtility() - Constructor for class org.matrix.olm.OlmUtility
 
oneTimeKeys() - Method in class org.matrix.olm.OlmAccount
Return the "one time keys" in a dictionary.
The number of "one time keys", is specified by OlmAccount.generateOneTimeKeys(int)
Ex: { "curve25519": { "AAAABQ":"qefVZd8qvjOpsFzoKSAdfUnJVkIreyxWFlipCHjSQQg", "AAAABA":"/X8szMU+p+lsTnr56wKjaLgjTMQQkCk8EIWEAilZtQ8", "AAAAAw":"qxNxxFHzevFntaaPdT0fhhO7tc7pco4+xB/5VRG81hA", } }
Public API for OlmAccount.oneTimeKeysJni().
Note: these keys are to be published on the server.
oneTimeKeysJni() - Method in class org.matrix.olm.OlmAccount
Get the public parts of the unpublished "one time keys" for the account.
The returned data is a JSON-formatted object with the single property curve25519, which is itself an object mapping key id to base64-encoded Curve25519 key.
